sn51.4:1.1: “Cattarome, bhikkhave, iddhipada bhavita bahulikata ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattanti.
sn51.4:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti,
sn51.4:1.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro iddhipada bhavita bahulikata ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattanti”ti.
